title: Finance Tracker: Categorize Transactions with Partial Failures
description:
Implement a transaction categorizer that handles partial failures for the Finance Tracker.

**Requirements:**
- Categorize a list of transactions concurrently
- Some transactions may fail (invalid format, missing data)
- Return lists of successfully categorized and failed transactions
- Use the safe wrapper pattern to handle failures gracefully
instructions: Complete the transaction categorizer with partial failure handling.

hints.text: **Hint:** Use `tg.create_task()` to start each categorization, and `task.result()` to get the (status, result) tuple after the TaskGroup exits.

commonMistakes.mistake: Not wrapping individual operations in try/except
commonMistakes.consequence: One failure cancels all tasks instead of collecting partial results
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap each async operation in a safe_* function that returns (status, result) tuples

commonMistakes.mistake: Catching Exception instead of specific error types
commonMistakes.correction: Only catch the specific exceptions you expect (CategorizationError)
